title: Organize certifications in a grid layout

requirements.text: Refactor the CertificationsGallery component to organize all 54 certification images in a structured grid layout with consistent spacing, alignment, and uniform card dimensions

quotes: Organize the certifications in a grid layout

acceptanceCriteria: All certification images are displayed in a uniform grid with consistent card sizes
Grid maintains proper spacing between items using gap utilities
Each certification card has equal width and height within the grid
Grid preserves existing hover effects and click-to-expand modal functionality
Layout remains responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints

requirements.text: Implement a responsive grid system for the CertificationsGallery that displays 1 column on mobile (sm), 2 columns on tablet (md), 3 columns on larger tablets (lg), and 4 columns on desktop (xl) screens

quotes: Organize the certifications in a grid layout

acceptanceCriteria: Grid uses Tailwind's responsive grid utilities (grid-cols-1, md:grid-cols-2, lg:grid-cols-3, xl:grid-cols-4)
Column counts adjust smoothly at each breakpoint
Grid maintains visual balance at all screen sizes
No horizontal overflow occurs on any device size

requirements.text: Apply consistent styling to each certification card in the grid including aspect ratio preservation, border radius, shadow effects, and background color matching the portfolio's design system

quotes: Organize the certifications in a grid layout

acceptanceCriteria: Each card uses aspect-ratio or object-fit to maintain consistent dimensions
Cards have rounded corners using border-radius utilities
Cards include subtle shadow effects (e.g., shadow-md or shadow-lg)
Background colors align with the existing slate/teal color scheme
Certification images are centered and properly contained within their cards

constraints: Preserve existing click-to-expand modal functionality with CertificateModal
Maintain keyboard navigation and accessibility features (Escape, ArrowLeft, ArrowRight)
Keep all 54 certification images in the gallery without removal
Do not modify the modal component (CertificateModal.tsx)
nonGoals: Adding category labels or filtering functionality to the certifications
Reordering or sorting certifications by type or date
Implementing lazy loading or pagination for certification images
Creating separate galleries for different certification categories
